website_summaries.verdict: This batting net comes at a reasonable price and can be set up quickly.
pros: Works reliably and is easy to move and set up for practices
Durable and a great value for a batting practice aid
cons: This product does not provide a fully enclosed netting system

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I had high hopes for this net, and even those were surpassed. Sets up in minutes, super light to pick-up and move around, yet does not tip over with the tee just feet away and power hits (without using the stakes). We have had it up for a month and it has stood up to 3 kids playing for hours almost daily. I considered buying the 5x5 and am so glad I purchased the 7x7 - the extra space has been helpful for the 8-11 age group. Gives target practice for throws, adjustable, as well as hitting off the tee.
customer_reviews.author: HR Mom

customer_reviews.title: A must need for all ball players of all levels
customer_reviews.text: My son and I absolutely love this hitting net. Quality is top-notch, looks cool, the larger size really allows you to let loose on hitting the ball and easy to set up in just minutes and to break it down for storage or to travel with. It comes with a carrying case and weighted balls. Not sure of the quality of the weighted balls and how long they will last, but we didn't purchase this product for that purpose. With that being said, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HoustonAstrosFan1970

customer_reviews.title: Great Net
customer_reviews.text: Great net!!! Use for both my daughters who play fastpitch softball and practice hard, it works great. Pretty easy to set up and take down and will only get easier the more i do it. Have looked at several different nets and almost all the other brands looked way cheaper/lower quality build then the Rukket and way more costly then the Rukket. Definitely getting more for your dollar with this product. Would recommend if your looking for a quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny1223

customer_reviews.title: great value, must have for baseball/softball couches and players
customer_reviews.text: this net has worked really well. It is a little heavier the some of the other nets I have carried but it also stays put after you set it up. love the strike zone. Daughter loves hitting the practice balls and we can hit them in the front yard even with out the net. The bag is big enough that it is not a struggle to but it away and it only takes a couple minutes to set up and take down which makes it perfect for practice with the team and pregame warm up.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Net
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing. Easy to set up, I did it myself in 5 to 10 minutes. My boys played with it eight away. Structurally sound and durable. I cant attest to how it would stand up to a power hitter; my boys are only 5 and 8 years old lol. But it stood up to wind and rain, which we got two days after it was set up. I also had to move it over to my back porch a week later to get it out of the way so the lawn man could cut my grass. It stayed intact and I have no issues with it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble. Very quick with two adults. It's pretty large so you'll need some open space or a good size back yard. It seems to be quite well made but only time will tell. Northern Arizona weather can be very tough on anything left outside during freezing and super hot temps. The next seems pretty well made and hopefully will last a few years. Got this for my 10 year old grandson to practice throwing and hitting off of a tee.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Moker

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Loved how easy it was to put together. Used it for the first time yesterday, I’ve had a few nets before this one, even the one that you just toss up in the air and it unfolds. This net is superior because; it has a solid stable base for support, aassembly and disassembly was simple and straight forward. No need to find a “You tube video” for it. Net is a heavy gauge and the travel bag fit every thing easily inside of it. I hope to use it and have it a long time. Thanks for the quality and workmanship Rukket! Mikie C
customer_reviews.author: Mikie C

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Very sturdy and quality made
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very sturdy and quality made. That weighted training balls are great practice and hold up to a lot of abuse. The net is very well made and quality. If I had to say one negative thing it is that the bottom of the net has one Velcro strap in the middle. This makes both bottom sides open for balls to go under the net. I put two small Velcro straps on either side myself to help this not happen but honestly if you are hitting the ball like you should this shouldn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: christopher pearson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product/training aid
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. The quality is better then I expected. The set-up was extremely easy and even my 10 year old daughter can do it on her own in 1-2 minutes. The Strike Zone attachment is very simple and my daughter's coach said he thought it was far superior to the one he has been using. I highly recommend this product for it's simplicity, design, and quality.
customer_reviews.author: N_Ansel

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Good price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to practice his pitching. The net is very durable and it is easy to setup. You don't have to worry about tearing this net up, it is strong. Setup took about 10 minutes the first time and then it is a snap after you figure the parts out. The weighted balls are good to strengthen the arm. Good pitching workout. The fifth star goes to the fact that you can put it into a pouch and take it with you anywhere. That is handy. Good product, good price! I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... only used this 2 times now and it is great so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this 2 times now and it is great so far. First impression after unpacking the box is the net and support are very well constructed. Heavy netting makes this seem very durable. Took me about 5min to put together the first time but about half that time the second. Very stable once together and I have not had to use the stakes so far. I would recommend based on the quality of the material so far. I will update after a month of use as we head in to practices.
customer_reviews.author: AGuyInTX

customer_reviews.title: Very stable and a good price compare to other batting net out there..
customer_reviews.text: I have low expectations but I was very satisfied... I bought it for a good price but even if I paid higher I would still buy it knowing what I know now. Very stable - easy to assemble - 1 person can do it but 2 will be easier.. the ball that comes with it is also a bonus - haven't used it since I have 12 other heavy balls similar to it.. the bag is also a bonus although I don't put it there anymore as I use it consistently in my backyard ..
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality check process. Ordered replacement. Lost practice time.
customer_reviews.text: Bad experience with this product. This was either a recycled-return that didn’t go thru QC (from the existing scratch marks), or, just bad product design quality. One of the base pipes simply wouldn’t fit because the hole for the side pole insert was bent. Check pictures. This is really well built and heavy so fixing it up myself was not an option. Ordered a replacement but losing practice time between reshipping. Rukket should do better than this on QC.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerSpeaks

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact this was delivered to a vacant lot not too far from my house (the lot owner found it and brought it over to us), the net is great for the kids to practice their batting and catching. Came with 3 weighted balls that they love as well. It's a lot bigger than I realized when I ordered it, the kids are little and could have used one that was a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: BusyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I have been out of commission because of back surgery and unable to work with my son so I ordered the Rukket 6 piece bundle so he can continue to train and I can watch and offer tips. I like that it came with the weighted balls plus the strike zone. The price couldn’t be beat. Easy to put together and very durable. I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: rw4wings20

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this net system. It's very easy for me/my kids to set up and break down, which is hugely important as we use it in the back yard and don't want to leave it out in the elements. It has also shown to be very sturdy, handling balls hit by my 17-year-old without a problem. Nice for pitching, too. Works great for 80+ mph pitches and also provides a large area to catch the sometimes less than accurate pitches of my younger son. Heavy balls are a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: gamermom

customer_reviews.title: Love this net!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this net a few weeks ago and we love it! Great net for hitting and pitching. Very sturdy. The weighted balls are great as well. The practice with this has really helped our son improve his skills this year. The only thing we wish is that it came with more than three balls. Overall a great purchase! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised and not expensive as some alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for. It's durable, stays in place well, easy to set up and take apart, easy to transport and it doesn't break the bank. We haven't used the weighted practice balls, yet, but they seem just as good as the more expensive yellow ones we already had. I can't speak about the longevity of the product (since we haven't had it that long), but I am very pleased with it, overall.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: This net is fantastic, most definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This net is fantastic, most definitely worth the price. - My very first time putting it together, it took 6 minutes. After a few times putting it together, it now takes about 3 minutes (by myself) - With the carrying bag, it is very portable - Very, very durable. Wind doesn't knock it over, and I can even hit weighted baseballs into the net and it won't budge. Comes with extra straps to pin into the ground, but I've never had a need to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good value and bonus weighted balls
customer_reviews.text: Just like most of these pop up travel nets, but at a better cost and the bonus of getting the weighted balls. I did have trouble keeping the target on at first too, but moved the holder down the pole at the top more and hooked the bottom on the rope in there bottom corners and it stayed on the without issue after that. I can't speak to the longevity yet, but this net feels like it will last me plenty long. I would definitely recommend this net and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Very Well Made, Competetive Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, as good if not better than the more recognized brand. The seams are strong and the material in the netting on the Rukket Sports seems thicker and more durable than other brands. Well designed - there is enough "give" to the net that when balls are hit or pitched to the outside of the net opening they will often still go into the net opening. This has increased the amount of time my athletes spend pitching and practicing their swings. Excellent product, very competitive price. I would buy another Rukket Sports product without hesitation. This one is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: shiver_me_timbers

customer_reviews.title: Great for a backstop when pitching to my 10 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for a backstop when pitching to my 10 year old son. It catches the balls he doesn't hit but it does not stop foul balls from hitting the car. He uses it to practice pitching and really likes having a target to hit the different parts of the strike zone. The target is helpful when I pitch to him and we can decide if it was a strike or not.
customer_reviews.author: JKZ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good buy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy and easy to disassemble to put up and out of way. Fits nicely in the bag it comes with. My 15 year old can easily set it up and take it down by himself. The net is good material, not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: AA314

customer_reviews.title: Good construction. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this baseball net is put together very well. Set up was pretty straightforward but if you plan on using on the field before games or practice, it will takes a number of minutes to assemble. The net is constructed well, which was my biggest worry. I am very satisfied with the purchase. And the heavy balls were a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Quality Throughout. Could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.text: From the moment the package was delivered I knew this would be the best practice net we have had in the last ten years. Great packaging, great instructions, east set up. Good Size. Sturdy as possible and easy to take back down and pack away. Quality is just evident throughout, even in the supportive information like guaranty packet etc.... If we need to ever replace it I would definitely buy another. Price and quality can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: G. Yas

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Second time I have emailed Rukket for an issue. This time the strike zone attachment ripped through heavy use after 14 months of ownership. Again, one of the most pleasant, efficient experiences I have ever had with customer service! With one email to customer service they sent a replacement attachment out (free of charge) and it got here in two business days. I wish I could give 6 stars. BTW my son loves the actual net and the pitching squares. Absolutely great, well made product!
customer_reviews.author: WAG

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality product and easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: I'd looked at several brands before deciding on the Rukket set. We've been thoroughly pleased with all the quality, features, and components. It's really easy to set up and take down. With care It can be moved by one person while assembled( it's taller than the average garage door). It works great with our real baseballs, limited flight, and the weighted. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sekova

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, super portable and easy to put together. My only gripe is that the balls may pop out from time to time when hit, could be fixed with a slightly deeper pocket but overall a very good product and great deal with the weighted balls
customer_reviews.author: Albert C.

customer_reviews.title: Great net. Good price. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice practice net, sets up quick and easily. Already had some Rukket TC Balls but needed more. I will say that these TC Balls looked a little different than the first ones I got. Even had one kid say they were heavier. I weighed all the ones I had and that all are within a decimal oz of each other but three of them look a little bigger but not by much. Great Products from Rukket. If you are looking for practice net and TC Balls I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: charles a clausen

customer_reviews.title: Great net!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful net and it’s great for pitching and hitting. My 7 year old loves throwing for hours into the strike zone. Worth the money. High quality and so glad I went with the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I love Rukket products
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Rukket products. They are extremely well built and have a lifetime warranty. I coach an 8U team and will be using this for practices and for my son to practice on in the offseason. The weighted balls are nice for the boys to hit to build up some strength.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: A quality piece of training equipment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. I was amazed and pleased with how easy it assembled and when we finished for the day, break down and place in the storage bag that came with it. We practiced pitching using the strike zone overlay that came with the net and had a wonderful time. The weighted balls are a great training aid and will help in improving my grandson's pitching and throwing skills. I was very impressed with the quality of my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don Newport

customer_reviews.title: The set up was very easy. It comes down easy for storage as well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son to get some tee work in at home. The set up was very easy. It comes down easy for storage as well. So far it has been exactly what I thought it would be. The pitching target allows my son to get pitching practice in when I am not around to catch for him. He has not done a lot of work yet with the weighted balls but I can see that those will be beneficial as he works with them. Over all very happy with our purchase and would consider other products from Rukket for golf work.
customer_reviews.author: Joel M. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Quality product as reasonable price, good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 boys in competitive baseball 9 & 12 y.o. Purchased Rucker net and weighted hitting balls for backyard tee practice and pitching. Upon open the package I nlknew this was a good purchase. Quality metal tubing for base, strong fiberglass poles for sides, and sturdy net for years of practice. Wight balls are good quality as well. Net is easy to set up and take down after 1st try. Quality travel bag as well, which will come in handy for touraments. Rukket Sports had great service from momen of order sending me emails with video on setup. Take a look.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R. Norton

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. We've only had it a couple of weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We've only had it a couple of weeks and 3 or 4 uses but it performs as it should. Simple assembly and NO plastic parts which is nice. The bottom frame is a four piece all metal design. I've seen some nets where the T portion is plastic and eventually breaks. Looking forward to a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: thanz

customer_reviews.title: By far the best net for tee-work
customer_reviews.text: By far the best net for tee-work, soft toss and pitching/fielding practice I have used. I've used others that require so much time to set up, they stay out in the weather and eventually rot and they are too inconvenient to take to the field. This net is fast set up (a minute or two) easy take down and very stable. Really don't need the included pegs. The quality of the product is indisputable as well. Put it behind the plate and you have a catcher for batting practice. Put it at 1st base, a first baseman for infield work. Use it as a target for relay throw practice. It is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! It’s been outside and still holds up. My son plays select ball and still goes out back and uses it. Doesn’t look rotted and is still sturdy. I noticed it is starting to fade some. It will blow over with string winds. Even if pinned down. So be careful of plants or bushes.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Durable product well put together.
customer_reviews.text: Just a wonderful product and it was built correctly. It looks and feels durable. My little guy is extremely happy with it. Would recommend it to any parent with young kids up to I'd say 16 years old. It's a great way to have them practice on hitting and pitching. Very durable, even after I took a few swings and pitches at it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HAD IT FOR OVER A YEAR.
customer_reviews.text: Had it over a year, lots of use, never took it apart, stays in the sun and weather the whole time. Net has a few holes in the pocket where it runs on the ground. But other then that it is still functional and the holes actually give you better access to the balls in the pocket. The strike zone that comes with it didn’t last more then 4months and rotted off, is the only strike against it.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbellied1

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely pleased with the Rukket 7x7 Baseball & Softball Practice Hitting ...
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely pleased with the Rukket 7x7 Baseball & Softball Practice Hitting Net PRO Bundle w/ 3 Training Balls & Strike Zone that I purchased. The product was very well made and the instructions were easy to understand. I have purchased lots of coaching aids as a youth baseball and softball coach, and assembly instructions are all too often missing or hard to understand. Setting up and taking down the net was quick and easy. The net and it's contents was well packed and arrived on time. Overall I was very impressed with this product and would definitely purchase from Rukket again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hitting Net!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this net. Right out of the box, it was setup in under 5 minutes. It is extremely sturdy, I haven't had to use the provided stakes. My son has been hitting off of a tee into the net outside as well as in our garage. The net doesn't move an inch. The strike zone target is the perfect size and easily adjustable. My son likes using the strike zone to see how accurate his pitching is. Much better than pitching to me. The heavy balls are well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Oberhand

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Good product so far, sturdy and easy to use. took me a few tries to assemble first (of course i didn't read instructions) but gets easier every time. the heavy balls are great for the price. Am using it for 8yr old girls softball practice.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: It is a good net and easy to set up and tear down
customer_reviews.text: We used this net throughout our fall softball season. It is a good net and easy to set up and tear down. The stakes that come with it are kind of cheap, but you really don't need them unless it's super windy. The three weighted balls were a great bonus. I love the net and will recommend it to anyone who's looking to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for everyone looking to get better in hitting amd throwing & pitching.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for boys and girls looking to get better in hitting and getting their arm stronger for pitching . They can use a tee or throw it up by hand and work on hand eye coordination. Then use the weighted balls for pitching too. I even bought nine more weighted balls so they dont need to run down after pitching 3 balls. Good construction at half the price of bownet.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this product for 2 years now. We use it at home and I also coach a travelling fastpitch team. The net itself held up well. Easy to put up and take down. The bag ripped during the first year. The second year we had a plastic piece pop out of the side. We were able to beat it back in. Overall for the price the product has held up well with the exception of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie24

customer_reviews.title: This bundle is a fantastic value and the net/frame seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My net arrived with a defect and customer service was very responsive in addressing the issue. This bundle is a fantastic value and the net/frame seems very sturdy. I also have a Bownet and this net compares very favorably. So far, I would say they are on par and would consider another Rukket net because of the value. UPDATE: I bought this item again and really enjoy it. The strike zone attachment is easy to setup, is struday and stays in place with no issues. I'd recommend giving this a shot with no questions. Worked out great for my team.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Great for soft toss and tee work
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup for 10u team. Hundreds of balls hit into it and it is holding up great. Very impressed with this net. Only slight concern is the middle sag at top, but it looks exactly like the picture. Boys just stand closer when hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time but I had an issue with the balls included. I contacted customer service about the issue and they were very responsive and courteous. They resolved my issue quickly. My son and I setup the net and practiced on Sunday for 2 hours. Net is the perfect size and very durable. Setup was under 2 minutes and breakdown was just as fast. I would recommend this product to anyone on the market for a net.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Zapata

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend Rukket to ANYONE that is looking for nets no ...
customer_reviews.text: This has surpassed my expectations so far! I looked for I don't know how long at nets to purchase, and after coming across this one it was a no brainer! The net was the exact same as all the expensive brands, but came with a price tag that was a fraction of the cost!! Also you get more with this net! 3 practice balls and a strike zone! I would recommend Rukket to ANYONE that is looking for nets no matter what the age of the player!!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Performance and value beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by the quality, quick setup and durability of the Rucket 7 x 7. It is stable enough during middle school batting practice without the included stakes, though we use them anyway. Look forward to taking this in the handy carry bag to many backyard seasions, practices and game warmups for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Dbkassner

customer_reviews.title: Great net and all around product
customer_reviews.text: Great net and all around product. Doesn't fall over when I hit into it and comes with ground stakes if you hit harder than I do. At first I wished the opening went further to the ground but then after using the golf net version for baseball I understand that it is to keep the balls from rolling back out after you hit them.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Mounts

customer_reviews.title: This net is easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This net is easy to set up, very useful for tee work, soft toss, warming up pitchers, or just as a mobile backstop. Practice and warmups are much easier with one or even several of these nets. I highly recommend getting one of these if you are going to coach a baseball team. The training balls are great for getting your players to drive through the ball for better power. Since they are designed to limit the flight of the ball, you don't have to go far to retrieve them.
customer_reviews.author: Jana J Puetz

customer_reviews.title: works, easy to set up for an adult or teenager
customer_reviews.text: We have used the net outside and inside. It's easy to set up for an adult. A 10 year old isn't tall enough to loop the net around the top of the poles. The Net works great, corals all the batted balls. The strike zone target works well too. It breaks the strike zone into 9 squares, so you can practice hitting the corners. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! The net is very sturdy and perfect for her hitting practice off the tee. During winter we set it up in the garage so she could still practice and with nicer weather in the backyard. Perfect size, easy set up and take down. The weighted balls are nice for working on her swing and power. Product is as described. All together we are very satisfied! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Must have product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and made tough. Son loves it and helps make batting practice faster and productive
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian bow hunter

customer_reviews.title: Extras are worth it
customer_reviews.text: Paid a little extra for this model to get the heavy balls. Quality is good. Welds seem to be good. Survived a first night of practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the Rukket 7x7 Baseball and Softball Practice Hitting Net PRO Bundle with 3 Training Balls and Strike Zone. Sturdier than I expected and well built. Easy enough for my boys (7 & 10) to set it up and use it when dad is at work. This system will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Perrin

customer_reviews.title: This Rukket practice is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This Rukket practice is perfect for me. The net and framework are sturdy-they handle T Balls, Baseballs, and weighted balls. The setup is quick and easy, and the weighted balls that come with this package are great for REALLY tracking the quality and follow-through of your swing. I am VERY happy with this package, and I have no reservations recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Manecke

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat'm
customer_reviews.text: Crazy good stuff! After using this and other items from Ruckett for about six months, I'd say you can't beat'm. Skookum as hell.
customer_reviews.author: GoPokes!

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My12-year-old son, and accomplish travel ball player, uses the net daily. First he hits into it off of TV, and then he pitches into it. So far, it appears very durable and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Great for teenagers
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 13 year old nephew. He and friends have used it every day with no trouble setting it up and holding up to 13-18 year old pitchers. They really love the strike zone marking, one of the reasons I selected this model.....Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Fun for any baseball enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Turned my boy, who did not like baseball, into a kid who likes to practice daily. Great to hit into, to pitch into, and as a "catcher" for kids playing whiffle ball. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: GM8484

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Wee should have purchased this before or during the baseball season, but didn't pick it up until recently. My son moves into player pitch in the spring and has been using this to practice. It's easy to set up and break down and is very sturdy. We have only hit balls into a few times, but that responds well, too. We will bring this to the games in the spring when the cages fill up for the whole team to take advantage of. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: RemoteControl

customer_reviews.title: The Rukket 7x7 baseball/softball practice net is an excellent value. I had used a Jugs popup net ...
customer_reviews.text: The Rukket 7x7 baseball/softball practice net is an excellent value. I had used a Jugs popup net for the past 6 years and it needed replaced. I decided to give Rukket net a try based on its price and other reviews. It is a great net. It is easy to assemble and disassemble. It has a wide hitting surface and keeps balls from going over the net - a problem I experienced often with the Jugs popup. I have been coaching youth baseball for 11 years and this is the best practice net I have used. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the netting is fantastic and set up and take down are fast and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this net based solely on the reviews I read, I must say that it is just what others have said. The quality of the netting is fantastic and set up and take down are fast and easy. I have a high school freshmen playing JV baseball and one in 8th grade right behind him. They have been using it the past few days and hitting into the net and it is holding up great. My high schooler is a pitcher and loves the strike zone attachment for ball placement. I think you can't go wrong with this product and the price was pretty good too!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: My teenagers love this net!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast and easy set up. All 4 of my kids are huge into baseball and softball and they love it for practice hitting and pitching!
customer_reviews.author: Markelle

customer_reviews.title: My 10'year old son is happy to have this in the yard for practice
customer_reviews.text: My 10'year old son is happy to have this in the yard for practice. I noticed during assembly that one of the upper loops is missing to attach the line for the strike zone. I called the company and left a message that our product had a defect but they did not contact me back.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: This sets up in minutes and is very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product as an additional net for my boys U8 baseball team and personal backyard training. This sets up in minutes and is very easy to put together. Very sturdy, easy to use and provides a wide span to ensure balls are not being hit wide or over the net. The bag works perfectly and is not too small to carry the parts and net. I had no issues with the net staying in one place as the wide pocket catches the balls and reduces the net from tipping over (not to mention the wide base).
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A Braz

customer_reviews.title: ... net for a few days and so far so good! Seems sturdy and was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this net for a few days and so far so good! Seems sturdy and was easy to put together. It is not the type that just "pops" up, but only took less than 5 minutes to put together and likewise take down. Everything fits in the carrying bag easily. The grid target for pitching and throwing accuracy is easily adjustable. So far so good and I assume will work well for a while into the future as I see no reason for anything to fail for any other reason than just use. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any aged baseball player
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as good as others which cost two to three times as much. Turkey offers a lifetime guarantee on the product which others similar bow types screens do not. The material is top notch and the assembly is very easy. My son plays with this every day practicing his pithing which the 9 pocket target is a must have. I would recommend this to any age baseball player to sharpen their skills also having a 7x7 net allows me to side pitch to him for batting practice. We can take this screen anywhere. The screen come apart easily and has a storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: my daughter plays softball and how awesome it is to find a net that is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this net a few days ago with the heavy balls... my daughter plays softball and how awesome it is to find a net that is sturdy, easy to setup and even comes with a pitching target.... love the product and best yet live the price... been using almost everyday since we inboxed it. I totally recommend this product and the money you save from purchase can go towards something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Rain, what rain! Great product for Garage Time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a smaller version. This model is VERY easy to assemble and will bring you many hours of Garage time workouts successfully to a close. This came with three heavy balls, a carrying case, and a pitchers target. All these extras are easily another 100 dollars worth of freebies. Did I mention that it comes with a LIFETIME warranty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Badmonkey

customer_reviews.title: The 5 star reviews are accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several weeks now, and it has definitely exceeded my expectations. I coach superleague baseball and it has been a very nice practice tool. I have had it out in pretty windy conditions and it has held up great. It is simple and fast to setup and take down. The reason I spent a little more and purchased this over other similar products was the good reviews and lifetime warranty. This is a well built product and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great net set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great net set, and the heavy balls are a plus. It is much better than a similar one we bought a few years ago that has fallen apart. It's so simple to put together that my 13 year old son did it in about 10mns. High quality, and the bag for storage will be great for winter storage.
customer_reviews.author: Davey Jones

customer_reviews.title: What a great value! Including the lifetime parts replacement is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected quality and performance! Initial i boxing and set up reveal that rukket is a top quality brand that will compete with sklz and other such sporting goods product developers. What a great value! Including the lifetime parts replacement is a no brainer! I would be really excited if they developed a hitting tee to partner with this bundle!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor a get this package!
customer_reviews.text: This group of products from Rukkett is perfect for practicing at home when your child wants to practice batting. It was easy to assemble and light enough to move around. Get yourself a good tee and you are good to go! My son also enjoyed the practice balls that came with this set. He says and I have to agree that the balls make a difference with his swing. He can feel the difference when he makes good or not so good contact when he practices with these balls. He has also been using the weighted balls for practicing his pitching. Great products! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! We put it in our basement with a Jugz tee. Works great. My son is only six and I may have been better off getting a 6x6 but I'm still very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. The net is easy to setup and is sturdy. My daughter hits into the net with heavy balls and 12" softballs in our garage where the net is not secured down without issue. It does not move at all. This net is high quality and we are very pleased with the purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us.
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Easy to assemble. No issues. If I had one negative it is that the additional strike zone target tends to come unhooked when hit by the ball. We changed to a different fastener to eliminate this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and even better price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and even better price. Works as advertised and I use it for both my 10 year old son's Little League practice and my 12 year old daughter's fast pitch softball practice. so far has handled everything we throw at it. Saw similar products for more money and without the 16 oz. weighted Batting practice balls. A++++++. also super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ramos

customer_reviews.title: ... season of fastpitch softball and this has been a great training aid for me to work with her
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old granddaughter is playing her first season of fastpitch softball and this has been a great training aid for me to work with her. The net is easy to assemble and has strong construction. I would recommend this product even if you have a more seasoned or older person playing ball. The carry bag is also a plus for transporting the net.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Rukket 7x7 net and training balls.
customer_reviews.text: We have been pricing nets like this one since April so when I saw the price and the bonus training balls we jumped on the deal. We took the Rukket 7x7 net to our state softball tournament and it was great. We love the durability of the product. What is even better is my 9 year old can set it up by himself and practicing on his pitching. The training balls work great. Just like a set one of the softball coaches bought for $50.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is holding up pretty well. The size is just right for him ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted. For a stretchy nylon net on fiberglass poles, it is holding up pretty well. The size is just right for him to hit into and he is using it right now for a soccer goal. It packs away easily and is easy to re-position in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: L. Maffett

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this Rukket set up.
customer_reviews.text: Since getting this net I have probably set it up over fifty times and it is just as strong as the first set up. It is built very well and it would take a lot to destroy it. The assembly is very easy and take down is a breeze. I have a 11yr old and 7yr old and it is perfect for all the drills we do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Castillo

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Works good for us, after the first set up it gets easy
customer_reviews.author: Nate 81

customer_reviews.title: Better then I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Better then I was expecting. Quick easy assembly, less than two minutes and it is up. I coach two kids teams and this works great for practices or perfect for the backyard. We use it for tee practice or soft toss. The kids love the strike zone attachment and have pitching contests. We even use it as a backstop for our backyard wiffle ball games. Definitely would recommend. Best part is if anything happens to it, it has the lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality net
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality construction and easy to setup. The bottom frame and side poles on this are a little heavier duty on this one than I have seen on others. Net is a really good quality, can wait to get it out on the baseball field.
customer_reviews.author: EllicottCityPrime

customer_reviews.title: Super easy fast and simple setup.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome net, very easy to put together without instructions setup in 4 minutes and on our way to making great softball players. Use it for Tee Hitting, throwing, pitching and i even use it to cat pitching machine balls while we are aimed at the backstop so we can have batting practice with pitching machine anywhere. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN STAHLMAN

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Our travel baseball team used bownet products for several years, but I cam across the Rukket product while looking for equipment for our new 8U team. After it arrived the quality appears to be just as good or better than our bownet, plus it came with three heavy balls and was significantly cheaper than the standalone bownet. I would take a good look at Rukket products before purchasing a competing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressively engineered - very useful!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome - my kids love it and it's come in handy at our team practices, giving pitchers a target to throw at and hitters to hit into. It takes about 3 minutes to put together and to take apart. My 8 year knows how to do it (he just can't reach the top parts).
customer_reviews.author: Peter Arnold

customer_reviews.title: This is a great net, super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great net, super sturdy, great for my son to pitch and hit into and I no longer have to chase balls all over the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Good value!
customer_reviews.text: This net is made of very durable netting compared to what I was expecting. It has served its purpose very well over the few weeks we have used it so far. It is also very easy to disassemble & assemble once you get the hang of it. The three weighted balls and the strike zone attachment are very useful additions to the bundle. It is a lifesaver as a parent because now my son can hit and pitch balls into the net instead of needing me to play with him every time!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very nice net!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this net after doing research on other nets. This net was comparable to another top known brand, but rated just as good. I decided to try this as it was about $70 less than the other one my daughter uses at softball practice. It was extremely easy to set up and take down. We used it on a windy day and it held up nicely. Would definitely recommended because it seems to be a quality product, but also because of the price difference and warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy35

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this for Tee drills, soft toss and as a backstop when pitching to my team. It is a must have if you are a coach.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: ... of different nets for pitching and this is the best one I have found by far
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different nets for pitching and this is the best one I have found by far. It is extremely simple to put together and take apart and it provides a huge target. This is really great for back yard pitching where you really need something to catch missed pitches. I can't recommend this net highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: DavidNYY

customer_reviews.title: should have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. The net is just as good as I have seen with the Bownet. Setup was simple and fast. Take down took less than 3 minutes. I used the stakes to keep it from moving, but my 2 girls did not move it when hitting. The sand balls are a great addition to this package. Just Like the Total control balls. Only issue I saw once was that the left hand side bow was hit by a 12 inch ball and got knocked out, but it only happened once in about 3 hours of hitting. You can not beat the price on this product for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: James Tule

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be excellent quality and I hope will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Just set this up and my son loves it! Seems to be excellent quality and I hope will last a long time. Also was quit easy to put up. Took only 5 minutes and we were ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: R. Summers

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy it is to put up and break ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to put up and break down. I also love the versitality of the product. I highly recommend this hitting/ pitching net for any baseball/softball enthusiast. Wether you are a parent, coach, or player, you will love this piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: walk'n Tall

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 12 year old grandson for Christmas. He hasn't opened the box yet because it's too cold outside. He has a Franklin one currently but after about three years it's starting to look a little shoddy. So decided he was ready for a new one and this looked great and got good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY KACIN

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Huge and sturdy .
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The rucket is perfect for my 10 year old as well as my 16 year old to get their reps in no matter the weather. Can easily be taken apart and put together which makes it great for taking to practices. So easy my 16 year old did it in about 15 minutes. I’m definitely please with the purchase and the price .
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Beach

product_meta.title: Rukket 6pc Baseball/Softball Bundle | 7x7 Hitting Net | 3 Weighted Training Balls | Strike Zone Target | Carry Bag | Practice Batting, Pitching, Catching | Backstop Screen Equipment Training Aids
feature_bullets: 6pc BUNDLE: Original Rukket Sock It! 7x7 baseball/softball sock-style bow frame net, three PurePower weighted training balls, strike zone target, and carry bag.
STOP CHASING BALLS AROUND THE YARD: Our unique fold-up design makes the net easy to set up so you can start practicing within minutes, and waste less time chasing balls.

PERFECT FOR BATTING and PITCHING SKILL DEVELOPMENT: Our super strong 7-ply knotless netting and increased frame thickness adds rigidity and weight for greater stability when batting and pitching into the net.
FOLDS DOWN and EASY TO TRANSPORT: The sturdy and stable yet lightweight net and frame collapse into the included carrying bag for easy transport and storage.
RUKKET 100% LIFETIME WARRANTY and SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Includes lifetime replacement parts and outstanding USA-based email and phone customer service for no-risk purchasing.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
